mapper.select: select * from(select * , row_number() over (order by Id) as rownum from ${table})AAA where AAA.rownum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: set IDENTITY_INSERT T_CheLiangJiBenXinXi on; insert into T_CheLiangJiBenXinXi([id], [companyid], [address], [vehicleno], [platecolor], [seats], [brand], [model], [vehicletype], [ownername], [vehiclecolor], [engineid], [vin], [certifydateA], [fueltype], [enginedisplace], [photoid], [certificate], [transagency], [transarea], [transdatestart], [transdatestop], [certifydateb], [fixstate], [nextfixdate], [checkstate], [feeprintid], [gpsbrand], [gpsmodel], [gpsimei], [gpsinstalldate], [registerdate], [commercialtype], [faretype], [state], [flag], [updatetime], [reserved], [receivetime]) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seats,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certifydateA,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fueltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enginedisplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transagency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transdatestart,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transdatestop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{certifydateb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fixstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextfixdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeprintid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsmodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsimei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsinstalldate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{registerdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commercialtype,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{faretype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserved,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) set IDENTITY_INSERT T_CheLiangJiBenXinXi off;
